caption:
The HAVEN / Apapacho World collaboration celebrates the fusion of heritage and modern design. Crafted from raw marble sourced from Mexico’s storied mountainous regions, the collection features two exclusive pieces: a dual-purpose vase/bookend and a refined valuables box.

Each piece reflects the artistry of Toño González, a master stone artisan who combines time-honored techniques with cutting-edge tools to transform raw materials into striking forms. This collaboration highlights the shared ethos of Apapacho World and HAVEN—blending traditional craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics.

Available exclusively Friday, November 22nd at the Apapacho World pop-up shop, hosted at HAVEN’s Vancouver location. 

RSVP link in bio. 

@apapacho.world
